name: TOPPLE TANK
description:
explore a sandbox of cannons and rude dice as you try to find 150 medals and 15 flags to complete your mission! ha

pretty barebones but the basic platforming and tumbling mechanics are solid. This is basically just me exploring the unity environment. real fun engine for physicsy stuff. main focus here was making the tank look cute and be fun to move/roll around

super cool music created out of the blue by Jasozz! check his projects out at:http://jasozz.tumblr.com/

everything else me:http://bn05.tumblr.com/

controls (IMPORTANT):

keyboard

  • movement - wasd, arrow keys
  • jump- spacebar, X
  • shoot - Z
  • camera angle switch - left shift

controller(xinput)

  • movement - analog stick
  • jump- Y
  • shoot- A
  • camera angle switch- X
